FileFormat.FormatDescription: MicroStation Symbology Resource Files contain fonts and line styles, and are preinstalled with Bentley Microstation CAD software. When a Microstation Design is used with LISCAD software, the .rsc files match Microstation fonts and line styles with equivalent LISCAD ones.
FileFormat.ProvenanceName: The Canadian Centre for Architecture / The Canadian Centre for Architecture
